text: We utz laj tzij katzijon chrij ri Ukꞌojol ri Dios, Jesucristo Rijaꞌl ri David pa ri tyoꞌjal,1:3 Pa ri Ojer Tyoxalaj Wuj kubꞌij chi ri Cristo jun rijaꞌl ri nim taqanel David, Ezequiel 34:23, 24; 37:24, 25; Oseas 3:5. Are kubꞌij chi ri Jesús rijaꞌl ri David, xuqujeꞌ kubꞌij chi ri Cristo are Mesías.
